channel.title: Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.6.8)
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.6.8)

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Changelog # このプロジェクトの重要な変更点は以下のとおりです。 Keep a Changelogをベースにした形式で表記されています。 1.6.8 - 2024-03-12 # Fixed # If some component refers external component, internal error #921 1.6.7 - 2024-02-28 # Fixed # Compilation Error due to VRCImposterSettings with VRCSDK 3.2.x #905 Skinned Mesh Renderers with None mesh will become Mesh with no polygons #906 This may affects bounds of Performance Rank in VRChat Exclusions not working with Automatically Remove Zero Sized Polygons #907 Fix non-VRChat project support #884 (backport in #909) Merge Toonlit with uv tiling is broken #911 1.
